dublinCore.dc:rights: Pursuant to Title 17 Section 105 of the United States Code, this file is not subject to copyright protection and is in the public domain.

action.action-desc: Mr. Tony Gonzales of Texas introduced the following bill; which was referred to the Committee on Homeland Security

form.official-title: To authorize appropriations for Operation Stonegarden, and for other purposes.

section.text: This Act may be cited as the Border Operations Strengthened by Stonegarden Act or the BOSS Act.

section.header: Operation stonegarden appropriations and trust fund
section.text: There is authorized to be appropriated for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2025 $180,000,000 for the Operation Stonegarden grant program of the Department of Homeland Security, and not less than $60,000,000 for each of fiscal years 2022 through 2025 to procure technology and equipment, including communications equipment, sensors, and drone technology.
